title: Sous Style Font ID - Sans and Serif Font ID??
content:
Hi Typophiles,

Wondering if you could help me out with IDing the fonts used on this site: [Sous Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20140715002430/http:/www.sousstyle.com/). I've also attached a screen shot.

It looks like they're using a serif (in the CSS it specifies Baskerville, but I've not known Baskerville to look like that) and an unknown "Geometric Light" embedded typeface - but I'm having no luck identifying either.

Thanks much!!  
Michelle

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140715002430im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SousStyleSite_5854.jpg)
author: michme

comments.content: i believe it is Baskerville. many variations out there but [Old Baskerville XLight](http://web.archive.org/web/20140715002430/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/old-baskerville/) seems to match.
